meanings.sent1: Some bimbos believe everything they hear.
meanings.sent2: She thought he was a bimbo because of his silly actions.
meanings.sent3: The group of bimbos kept making the same mistake over and over.
meanings.sent4: Don't be a bimbo and fall for that scam.
meanings.sent5: He acted like a bimbo by not listening to any advice.

meanings.definition: A sexually attractive but unintelligent or frivolous woman.
meanings.sent1: The movie portrayed her as a bimbo with no brains.
meanings.sent2: She didn't want to be seen as a bimbo just because of her looks.
meanings.sent3: The bimbos at the party only cared about their appearance.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a bimbo when she realized she had been tricked.
meanings.sent5: The character in the show was always depicted as a bimbo.
